/* TaxBillMapper.getTaxBillRequestList */
SELECT tmmtb.BILL_DATE, tmmtb.BILL_SEQ, tmmtb.MEMBR_ORGN_CD, tmmtb.STORE_CD, tmmtb.MEMBR_NO, SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) AS MEMBR_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tmmtb.REQUEST_DT, 'yyyyMMddHH24miss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REQUEST_DT, tmmtb.REQUEST_AMT, tmmtb.STATUS_FG
FROM TB_MB_MEMBER_TAX_BILL tmmtb, TB_MB_MEMBER tmm WHERE tmmtb.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = #{membrOrgnCd} AND tmm.MEMBR_ORGN_CD = tmmtb.MEMBR_ORGN_CD AND tmm.MEMBR_NO = tmmtb.MEMBR_NO
AND ( 'N' = (SELECT NVL(MAX(ENVST_VAL), 'N') FROM TB_HQ_ENVST WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND ENVST_CD = '0001') OR tmmtb.STORE_CD IN (SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_HQ_EMPLOYEE_STORE_V08 WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND EMP_NO = #{empNo}) )
AND tmmtb.MEMBR_NO LIKE '%'|| #{membrNo}||'%'
AND SBPENC.D(tmm.MEMBR_NM) LIKE '%'|| #{membrNm}||'%'
AND tmmtb.REQUEST_DT BETWEEN #{startDate}||'000000' AND #{endDate}||'235959'
AND tmmtb.STATUS_FG = #{statusFg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY tmmtb.MOD_DT DESC, tmmtb.BILL_DATE , tmmtb.BILL_SEQ
